document_data.title: A map showing Ukolo in the Pasocada Basin.
document_data.name: Ukolo
document_data.mainbody: '''Ukolo''' was an [[Azuposi]] settlement in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.Activities: Despite its small size (its population was about 300), it was nonetheless important, for it was the center of Azuposi [[turquoise]] mining. Raw turquoise was exported from Ukolo to other, larger settlements were it was carved into jewelry and such.
